testcase.classname: To check the sign-up functionality of the chair Airlines
testcase.name: Check the sign up functionality with different types of datas
testcase.system-out: Given User need to be in home_page..........................................passed Given user clicks the customer login........................................passed Given user clicks signup from customer login................................passed When user enters the first name.............................................passed When user enters the last name..............................................passed When user enters the company name...........................................passed When user enters the street name............................................passed When user enters the city name..............................................passed When user selects the country...............................................passed When user enters the zip code...............................................passed When user enters the phone number...........................................passed When user enters the email..................................................passed When user enters the password...............................................passed When user re_enters the password............................................passed And user clicks the signup button...........................................passed
